attribution.title: Attribution
attribution.description: Thank you React Native for the website template.

experience/community-building.title: Community building
experience/community-building.description: As one of the founding DevRel engineers, my job heavily focused on ensuring seamless communication in the developer community. My responsibilities included the creation of new channels from the ground up as well as the management of existing ones:

experience/marketing-analytics.title: Marketing & Analytics
experience/marketing-analytics.description: As a DevRel engineer, my job often focused on tracking conversion rates, from observers to community members to customers. I have extensive experience in web analytics and data tracking, which are essential for understanding user behavior and for optimizing the developer experience.

experience/software-development.title: Software Development
experience/software-development.description: I have contributed to both software development and developer experience initiatives. Below are some key responsibilities and achievements from my previous roles:

experience/technical-writing.title: Technical writing
experience/technical-writing.description: Throughout my career, I have consistently engaged in various technical writing projects across multiple roles, focusing on clear and effective communication of complex information.

intro.title: Intro
intro.description: Since beginning my professional career in 2016, I have held various roles and contributed to a wide range of projects.
